title: Describe sampling distribution of gallons of gas

content.question: Which of the following is the best description of a dotplot created from the 100 sample means?

choices.label: The dotplot is skewed to the right with mean 10 gallons and standard deviation 4 gallons.
The dotplot is skewed to the right with mean 10 gallons and standard deviation 0.5 gallon.
The dotplot is skewed to the right with mean 10 gallons and standard deviation 0.4 gallon.
The dotplot is approximately normal with mean 10 gallons and standard deviation 0.5 gallon.
The dotplot is approximately normal with mean 10 gallons and standard deviation 0.4 gallon.

content.answer: The dotplot is approximately normal with mean 10 gallons and standard deviation 0.5 gallon.
